body:
Is the most low-effort meta guild/sub I've ever seen on the internet. I mean come the fuck on, most people here are just taking screenshots from the Discord chat and just proceed to crop them and post them here.

What sad is that these screenshots aren't even clever, or funny, or anything. 

I don't even get the purpose of this guild, man. Is it just a guild for people to get free ~~karma~~ rep with no effort whatsoever?

It would be better if people actually put effort into the things they posted here, not just the same bland, repetitive screenshots of the same 6 people who are constantly chatting in the Discord server. 

My advice? Fewer screenshots, more memes, or anything else -- just fewer screenshots god damn it.

Anyway, I know this is off-topic so there's a big chance it'll get kicked, I just hope somebody reads it and tries to make this guild at least a little bit better, and put more effort into their posts for fuck's sake, please.
body_html:
Is the most low-effort meta guild/sub I've ever seen on the internet. I mean come the fuck on, most people here are just taking screenshots from the Discord chat and just proceed to crop them and post them here.

What sad is that these screenshots aren't even clever, or funny, or anything.

I don't even get the purpose of this guild, man. Is it just a guild for people to get free karma rep with no effort whatsoever?

It would be better if people actually put effort into the things they posted here, not just the same bland, repetitive screenshots of the same 6 people who are constantly chatting in the Discord server.

My advice? Fewer screenshots, more memes, or anything else -- just fewer screenshots god damn it.

Anyway, I know this is off-topic so there's a big chance it'll get kicked, I just hope somebody reads it and tries to make this guild at least a little bit better, and put more effort into their posts for fuck's sake, please.

guild.description:
For memes and shitposting about everything that happens in our beloved "Official Ruqqus Discord"
 
---

## Posting Rules


Rule 1: 

This guild is for shitposting about people/events in the Ruqqus Discord server. Any post that is not related to this will be kicked to +general. If you need help regarding the discord server, +askruqqus, +general, or +hub would gladly accept your questions.


Rule 2:

No spamming. Spamming would be considered any of the following:

* Same-format posting within a day

* Same-content posting within a day (Same content, different format)


Spammed posts will get kicked and repeated offenses results in being exiled.


Rule 3: 

No reposts: reposts are cringe. Any reposts will be kicked.

Anyway, I know this is off-topic so there's a big chance it'll get kicked, I just hope somebody reads it and tries to make this guild at least a little bit better, and put more effort into their posts for fuck's sake, please.

author.bio:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.
author.bio_html:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.

body:
It's mostly just a guild for worshipping the mods of the discord server. The ironic thing is that the mods are really good people and don't promote that circlejerk one bit.

For some reason, all throughout history people have gotten off to setting up some kind of random hierarchy and worshipping those at the top as if they were gods. Idolatry is a deep natural desire for some reason, as messed up as it is. You can see larger scale examples of it with regards to celebrities, politicians, rulers, false gods, etc.

It's mostly just a guild for worshipping the mods of the discord server. The ironic thing is that the mods are really good people and don't promote that circlejerk one bit.

Is the most low-effort meta guild/sub I've ever seen on the internet. I mean come the fuck on, most people here are just taking screenshots from the Discord chat and just proceed to crop them and post them here.

What sad is that these screenshots aren't even clever, or funny, or anything.

I don't even get the purpose of this guild, man. Is it just a guild for people to get free karma rep with no effort whatsoever?

It would be better if people actually put effort into the things they posted here, not just the same bland, repetitive screenshots of the same 6 people who are constantly chatting in the Discord server.

My advice? Fewer screenshots, more memes, or anything else -- just fewer screenshots god damn it.

Anyway, I know this is off-topic so there's a big chance it'll get kicked, I just hope somebody reads it and tries to make this guild at least a little bit better, and put more effort into their posts for fuck's sake, please.
post.title: [Rant] This guild...

author.bio:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.
author.bio_html:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.

body:
I think they're getting at hivemind/tribalistic nature of this guild: https://ruqqus.com/post/3bg7/rant-this-guild/bfrm

But that happens everywhere and is virtually impossible to avoid if there's any sense of community at all.
body_html:
I think they're getting at hivemind/tribalistic nature of this guild: https://ruqqus.com/post/3bg7/rant-this-guild/bfrm

But that happens everywhere and is virtually impossible to avoid if there's any sense of community at all.

guild.description:
For memes and shitposting about everything that happens in our beloved "Official Ruqqus Discord"
 
---

## Posting Rules


Rule 1: 

This guild is for shitposting about people/events in the Ruqqus Discord server. Any post that is not related to this will be kicked to +general. If you need help regarding the discord server, +askruqqus, +general, or +hub would gladly accept your questions.


Rule 2:

No spamming. Spamming would be considered any of the following:

* Same-format posting within a day

* Same-content posting within a day (Same content, different format)


Spammed posts will get kicked and repeated offenses results in being exiled.


Rule 3: 

No reposts: reposts are cringe. Any reposts will be kicked.

parent.body: Sorry to hear @r0cks, but I don't really see any other way that we can properly express our discord here on the main site. Also, I do not really see a reason why this is wrong; its just a funny guild dedicated to your discord server.
